about.title: About me
about.description: I am a web and mobile developer passionate about the internet and programming for over 6 years. In my free time, I write articles on todaydevs and contribute to the Open-Source community

mystory.textcontent: It all started in 2012 when I tried to create a blog on Blogspot. At first, it worked well. But, after only a few days, I was limited by the features available. This motivated me to find a different solution, that's when I started learning web development. My goal is to take the knowledge and skills I have acquired in a positive direction. More than just enjoying myself, I want to help others.

nigatedev.title: NIGATEDEV FRAMEWORK
nigatedev.description: Nigatedev is a PHP framework coded by Abass Ben Cheik & contributors

webdev.title: Web development
webdev.description: I provide functional web services such as custom website development, wordpress development, e-commerce solutions and much more.

seo.title: SEO and security
seo.description: I offer excellent solutions in software security and SEO practices that will increase the quantity and quality of traffic to your website.

webdesign.title: Web Design
webdesign.description: I design stunning, intuitive websites that represent your brand and corporate identity through exceptional UI/UX design.
